sentences.ocr_sentence: I want to be a math teacher because teaching my friend makes me feel great.
sentences.corrected_sentence: I want to be a math teacher because teaching my friends makes me feel great.

sentences.ocr_sentence: Since I was in 6th grade, I have heard that I am good at solving math problems and teaching well, so I have dreamed of becoming a math teacher since then.
sentences.corrected_sentence: Since I was in 6th grade, I"ve been told that I"m good at solving math problems and teaching others, so I"ve dreamed of becoming a math teacher ever since.

sentences.ocr_sentence: When my friend understands well, I feel accomplishment.
sentences.corrected_sentence: When my friends understand the material well, I feel a sense of accomplishment.

sentences.ocr_sentence: I am proud of my teaching technique, and my friends and teacher love it.
sentences.corrected_sentence: I am proud of my teaching techniques, and both my friends and teachers appreciate them.

sentences.ocr_sentence: As I make it my main job, I want to have some positive effects on students.
sentences.corrected_sentence: As I pursue this as my main career, I hope to have a positive impact on my students.

sentences.ocr_sentence: My role model is my homeroom teacher who greets me kindly every morning.
sentences.corrected_sentence: My role model is my homeroom teacher, who greets me kindly every morning.

sentences.ocr_sentence: At the class time, she teaches students to understand well.
sentences.corrected_sentence: During class, she ensures that students understand the material thoroughly.

sentences.ocr_sentence: When I have concerns, she listens to me seriously and gives helpful advice.
sentences.corrected_sentence: When I have concerns, she listens to me attentively and offers helpful advice.

sentences.ocr_sentence: She also gives a lot of good influence.
sentences.corrected_sentence: She also has a significant positive influence on us.

sentences.ocr_sentence: One of this influence that I respect most is her passion for education.
sentences.corrected_sentence: One aspect I admire most is her passion for education.

sentences.ocr_sentence: My teacher goes to English school and she memorizes English words every morning in spite of her busy life.
sentences.corrected_sentence: Despite her busy life, she attends English classes and memorizes English words every morning.

sentences.ocr_sentence: It seems truly great to me to make the time to do what she wants to do.
sentences.corrected_sentence: I find it truly inspiring that she makes time to pursue what she wants to do.

sentences.ocr_sentence: She also reads books a lot.
sentences.corrected_sentence: She also reads a lot of books.

sentences.ocr_sentence: When I grow up, I want to be a teacher like her. "What can I do to reach my dreams?
sentences.corrected_sentence: When I grow up, I want to be a teacher like her. "What can I do to reach my dreams?

sentences.ocr_sentence: I will make a habit of reading books.
sentences.corrected_sentence: I will make a habit of reading books.

sentences.ocr_sentence: I will read books not only mathematics, but also other subjects, and I also read comforted books.
sentences.corrected_sentence: I will read not only mathematics books but also those on other subjects, as well as comforting books.

sentences.ocr_sentence: I may have some challenging times to me, but I don"t want to waste the time as I read a book. I want to control my mind.
sentences.corrected_sentence: I may face some challenging times, but I don"t want to waste time; instead, I want to use it to read and expand my mind.
